column4: well windows 7 here I come, linux - we'll meet again in 2-3 years when hopefully  you've matured enough to be usable
you haven't really provided any useful details -- also, have you tried posting on the forums?  http://ubuntuforums.org
I'm really not being a jerk here, I looked through the forums in and out and no-one got 3 monitors working correctly
found a thread asking the same question and the only reply was a bump by the author himself
